Round 1_question_0.preamble_text: Distinguish between reptiles and amphibians with respect to the following.
Round 1_question_0.answer_text: The respiratory organs in Amphibians are gills, skin, and lungs, whereas reptiles have only lungs

Round 1_question_1.preamble_text: Distinguish between reptiles and amphibians with respect to the following.
Round 1_question_1.answer_text: Amphibians are oviparous organisms, whereas reptiles can be oviparous or viviparous

Round 1_question_2.preamble_text: Distinguish between reptiles and amphibians with respect to the following.
Round 1_question_2.answer_text: Amphibians exhibit external mode of fertilization, whereas reptiles exhibit internal mode of fertilization
